attr.title: Lost Ethereal
attr.desc: Save your dead family from the spirit world. A pressureless and puzzling romp through the spirit world.
attr.inst: Download Lost Ethereal.exe for free at https://lucregames.itch.io/lost-ethereal -- simply drop the Lost Ethereal.exe file straight into the port's gamedata folder.
attr.inst_md: Download Lost Ethereal.exe for free at [https://lucregames.itch.io/lost-ethereal](https://lucregames.itch.io/lost-ethereal) -- simply drop the *Lost Ethereal.exe* file straight into the port's *gamedata* folder.
